changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Make the culture des selles reflexs non-quantifiable
changeSet.sql: update clinlims.test_result set is_quantifiable = false where test_id in ( select id from clinlims.test where guid in('806d1f8e-3619-44b5-bdb3-8924487c0253', '57c96193-5390-46d7-a3ab-02a7268dc057', 'f56ed65c-0f23-40cc-bb8a-54e298353ec0', '72fd780a-9523-4d3a-be0c-ef55da931a63', 'f47f26c8-241a-438b-86b6-02140453f56c', '31069e5e-9c28-4761-90cd-d60c9f2fa103', 'b39b4926-9070-40c3-91b9-f59b273f337d', '0c066a7c-c74d-4035-beb7-016ab4f9b96e', 'b6af5f95-0d6e-47fe-b807-fee697562494', '3cf8dbb7-d5b5-49bc-ad62-14483c63471f') );
